title: The President of the Republic and his Ugandan counterpart supervised the signing ceremony of agreements and memoranda of understanding
text: The President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune, has conducted, Sunday in Algiers, with his Ugandan counterpart, Mr. Yoweri Museveni, the signing ceremony of two agreements and five memoranda of understanding in several areas of bilateral cooperation.
The signing ceremony took place at the headquarters of the Presidency of the Republic.
These agreements and memoranda of understanding concern the fields of Energy, Tourism, Agriculture, Animal Health and Higher Education and Scientific Research.
President Tebboune had, previously, a one-to-one meeting with his Ugandan counterpart, extended, thereafter, to members of delegations of both countries.
